casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timmy SPEIGHT. No. 491PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2007. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC. Margaret Creasy Ciardella, Hampstead, for Speight.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of January 2007 by Defendant to Stay Issuance of Mandate and to Withdraw the Court's Slip Opinion:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of January 2007."
